summary: Gift Product Feature for Kiosk Combos - All tests passed. Backend API (9/9 tests) and Frontend UI fully functional. Premium Men칲 has Mozarella Sticks gift, Double XL Men칲 has Mac & Cheese gift. Gift badges, messages, and cart integration working correctly.

issues: TEST_ prefixed products visible (leftover test data from previous iterations)
React key warning: 'Encountered two children with the same key' - duplicate keys in product list
Missing DialogContent aria-describedby warning - accessibility improvement needed

Premium Men칲 has gift_product_id='mozarella-sticks', gift_product_name='Mozarella Sticks', gift_message='游꾸 Mozzarella Sticks Hediye!'

PUT /api/kiosk/combos/{id} - Can update combo with gift product

POST /api/kiosk/combos - Can create combo with gift product
Gift products are from allowed categories (Yan 칖r칲n, Tatl캼, 캻칞ecek)
Kiosk Page - Combo dialog shows gift badges (游꾸) on combos with gifts

Kiosk Page - Double XL Men칲 shows 'Mac & Cheese Hediye!' pink badge

Admin Panel - Men칲ler tab shows 游꾸 Hediye badge on combos with gifts
Admin Panel - Men칲ler tab shows gift product name (+ Mozarella Sticks) in pink text

Admin Panel - Combo edit dialog has 'Hediye 칖r칲n Se칞in' dropdown
Admin Panel - Combo edit dialog has 'Hediye Mesaj캼' input field

Fix React key warning - ensure unique keys in product list rendering
Add aria-describedby to DialogContent components for accessibility
critical_code_review_comments: Gift product feature implementation is complete and working correctly
Backend KioskCombo model properly includes gift_product_id, gift_product_name, gift_message fields
Frontend KioskPage.js correctly displays gift badges and adds gift info to cart
Frontend KioskAdmin.js correctly shows gift management in combo dialog
Gift product selection is limited to Yan 칖r칲n, Tatl캼, 캻칞ecek categories as expected

context_for_next_testing_agent: Gift Product feature for Kiosk Combos fully tested and working. Premium Men칲 has Mozarella Sticks gift, Double XL Men칲 has Mac & Cheese gift. Backend API supports gift_product_id, gift_product_name, gift_message fields. Frontend shows gift badges in combo dialog, cart, and admin panel. Gift product selection limited to Yan 칖r칲n, Tatl캼, 캻칞ecek categories. All 9 backend tests passed. UI tests confirmed gift display in Kiosk page and Admin panel.
